1: The findings of the study highlight the importance of early intervention in childhood education
(1) The study suggests that intervention in adulthood is crucial.
(2) Early intervention is shown to benefit childhood education significantly.
(3) The research found that education does not impact childhood development.
(4) Late intervention is more effective according to the study.
